featured.text: It was created 18 the format of XYX, with X being any number between 2-9 and Y being either 1 or 0.

definition.zh_def: 格式；安排或組織的方式。
definition.en_def: The arrangement or organization of something, often referring to the layout or structure.
definition.example: Please make sure to format your report according to the guidelines.
